name: Green Fires
description: Attempting to replicate the Somersby Elderflower Lime Cider. This seems close. Koolada might seem high, but the offtaste it gives helps the juice taste the way it should. Not a good place cor WS-23/FA Polar Blast.
author: COB

reviews.text: I can’t comment on authenticity, as I’ve never had the pleasure of Somersby Elderflower Lime Cider. I do really like the idea of combining lime and elderflower. However, and I know people have different tolerance levels when it comes to coolants, I have to say that this was almost unvapeable to me due to the freaking huge amount of Koolada. It was enough to sting the inside of my mouth and leave me feeling like I’d just eaten a bunch of frozen salt. Sucks because the floral-lime-apple thing leading up to that seems nice, but I just couldn’t enjoy it.
